DOC.brief_summary: Though possibly cost-saving , little scientific evidence effectiveness reasonable modality internet-delivered physical activity intervention primary prevention . The aim study compare influence different personal IT-based service level activity outcome obese , sedentary person evaluate minimum level service necessary maximum increase activity weight reduction .
DOC.criteria: Physical activity less per week BodyMassIndex 2835 kg/m2 Age 3565 Men woman CHD Diabetes Other chronic disease condition prohibit regular physical activity Drug abuse BMI < 28 > 35 Regular physical activity Pregnancy Mental illness
